body_html:
@ldmtwo : I'm sorry that the documentation is lacking. We welcome pull requests to improve them! So, please don't hesitate to contribute.

Since the issue description is a bit broad, I'm going to close this out. But if you can point out specific examples of what you find vague on individual documents, we'll be happy to address those (in which case re-open this issue or file a new one).

@ldmtwo : I'm sorry that the documentation is lacking. We welcome pull requests to improve them! So, please don't hesitate to contribute.

Since the issue description is a bit broad, I'm going to close this out. But if you can point out specific examples of what you find vague on individual documents, we'll be happy to address those (in which case re-open this issue or file a new one).
